name: openclaw-sysadmin-skills

priority-5-critical.description: 32 critical sysadmin skills - security, backups, monitoring

security_advisory.bitdefender_warning: 17% of analyzed OpenClaw skills showed malicious behavior. Always scan with Bitdefender AI Skills Checker before deployment.
